#0.4
How to take this course
Overview
Static Analysis
Debugging
Performance Tuning
This is  a  quick  tutorial  on  how  to  take  this  course.
This lesson gives you an overview of ProDev WorkShop.
This lesson introduces you to fundamental Static Analyzer tasks such as graphically displaying file dependencies, and displaying hierarchical class structures.
This lesson covers essential Debugger tasks such as stepping through code, setting breakpoints, and watching and modifying variables. 
This lesson introduces you to performance tuning using the Workshop tools.  
Do you want to begin
